summary: I have steered marketing strategic planning for some of the best-loved and most-recognized brands in franchising, including McDonald’s, Sport Clips, Cold Stone Creamery, Pump it Up, Massage Envy Spa and Godfather’s Pizza. Melding traditional and digital/social media, I have launched initiatives to enhance brand awareness, drive leads, deepen customer relationships, and bring to life the brand promise. Some of my career achievements:->  Executed compelling marketing programs to profitably capture sales, guest counts, and market share for owners/operators.->  Piloted modernization of the marketing infrastructure to grow brand aided awareness 5 times the closest competitor, spur revenue expansion, and increase value-added sales.->  Drove boost in same store sales orchestrating the first integrated national media campaign. Secured high-ROI spots with Ellen DeGeneres show and Live with Kelly and Michael.->  Executed national PR efforts fueling 1 billion household impressions. Obtained spots on the Doctors, CNBC, Fox and Friends, GMA, and articles in USA Today, Shape, and People.->  Joined with Arthritis Foundation National Director to develop stategic alliance and launch Healing Hands for Arthritis project.In addition, I enjoy serving as a presenter and panelist at industry conferences (Franchise Consumer Marketing, WFC Leadership), and recently contributed to articles in Advertising Age and Franchise Update.Expertise: Marketing Roadmaps ~ Brand Stewardship ~ Strategic Execution ~ Change Management ~ Strategic Partnerships ~ National Promotions ~ Business Planning ~ Business Intelligence ~ Research & Analysis ~ Loyalty Programs ~ Market & Media Planning ~ Target Messaging ~ Local Store Marketing ~ Budgeting & Forecasting ~ Talent Development ~ Coaching & Mentoring
